code: import{useEffect,useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import"./styles.css";import ProfileSearchForm from"./ProfileSearchForm";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BASE_URL="https://api.github.com/users";function ProfileViewerWithSearch(){const[username,setUsername]=useState("maram-qais");const[profile,setProfile]=useState({data:null,isLoading:true});useEffect(()=>{async function fetchUser(){try{const userResult=await axios.get("".concat(BASE_URL,"/").concat(username));setProfile({data:userResult.data,isLoading:false});}catch(error){setProfile({data:null,isLoading:false});}}fetchUser();},[username]);const search=username=>{setProfile({data:null,isLoading:true});setUsername(username);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProfileSearchForm,{search:search}),profile.isLoading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{children:"Loading..."}):profile.data?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:profile.data.avatar_url,alt:"Profile",className:"profile-img"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"mb-2 font-bold",children:profile.data.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"mb-2 font-bold",children:profile.data.bio}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"user-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"user-info-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:profile.data.followers}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{children:"Follower"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"user-info-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:profile.data.following}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{children:"Following"})]})]})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-red-500",children:"User not found"})]});}export default ProfileViewerWithSearch;
